medical.title: Medical screen
medical.preface: Just to be sure you're safe to exercise, do any of the following apply to you?

medicalList.description: Have you been diagnosed with a heart condition AND told that you should only do exercise under medical supervision?
Do you experience unexplained pains in your chest at rest or during exercise?
Do you have significant and unexplained dizziness?
If you have been diagnosed with diabetes, have you had significant problems controlling your blood sugars over the past 3 months?
Have you had a serious asthma attack in the past 12 months that required immediate medical attention?
Do you know of any other reason why you should not exercise?

medical.noticeLabel: This screening tool does not substitute advice from an appropriately trained medical professional. No responsibility is assumed by EXI for persons who undertake physical activity under this program.

noteModal.title: Please note:
noteModal.content: Please talk to a health professional before starting this exercise program. If you have already seen a health professional and they have recommended you start an exercise program, you may continue.
